document.full_text: teenagers ryo ishikawa and matteo manassero were among seven additional golfers to earn exemptions into next month's u.s. open championship at congressional, the u.s. golf association said tuesday.
document.title: teens ishikawa, manassero among seven added to us open field
lines_and_colors: teenagers ryo ishikawa and matteo manassero were among seven additional golfers to earn exemptions into next month's u.s. open championship at congressional, the u.s. golf association said tuesday.
